thread.title: Christine Wilson
thread.title_full: Auto Trader UK reviewed by Christine Wilson

author: Christine Wilson
title: Christine Wilson
text: Fantastic way to sell your car. We had three genuine enquiries and three viewings all on the first day and sold by lunchtime. Auto trader made everything so easy. Professional looking advert with step by step instructions and a large viewing audience made this an easy task. Highly recommended.
